Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.action

Class PowerUpAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.Action
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.ShootAction
        • it.polimi.ingsw.model.action.PowerUpAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CounterPowerUpAction, InTurnPowerUpAction
    public class PowerUpAction
extends ShootAction
    This class is a specific case of a shoot action class. It contains all the generic methods relative to an action that can be used to apply the effect of a power up card.

      • use

        public void use​(PowerUpCard powerUpCard)
        Description copied from class: Action
        Checks whether the power up gotten as input in contained in the list of the usable power up cards. If it is, the power up is added to the selectedPowerUp list.
        Overrides:
        use in class Action
        Parameters:
        powerUpCard - Reference to the power up being used in the action

        public boolean testCompatibilityWith​(PowerUpAction action)
